plot: As a drive-thru attendant at Stars Drive-In, 17-year old Christopher Brennan has big ambitions about saving the world. Not only does he take food orders, he gives personal advice to his customers in a gig he calls "Chris's Drive-Thru Counseling."
title: Christopher Brennan Saves the World
plot_es: As a drive-thru attendant at Stars Drive-In, 17-year old Christopher Brennan has big ambitions about saving the world. Not only does he take food orders, he gives personal advice to his customers in a gig he calls "Chris's Drive-Thru Counseling."
plot_en: As a drive-thru attendant at Stars Drive-In, 17-year old Christopher Brennan has big ambitions about saving the world. Not only does he take food orders, he gives personal advice to his customers in a gig he calls "Chris's Drive-Thru Counseling."
